content:
/>
XII.i.3.F.1.a
.
Application of Prohibition Against Duplication of Benefits
The prohibition against duplication of benefits applies whenever the claimant receives a sum of money or property to settle a legal claim arising from the death of the Veteran.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F - Prohibition Against Duplication of Benefits
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F
